text.autoconfig.imblocker.title: IMBlocker Config
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.basicSe: Listed screens would enable your IME.
Here lists all recorded Screens for whitelist editing.
§lThe method of setting English state when typing command

If your input method can't auto-switch to English state when typing command,
set this option to "DISABLE_IM" may help,
but note that you can only type English in this mode.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.advance: §lLocate the focus owner with char simulation

This approach can locate the focus owner with 100% accuracy.
Generally, the probe char will be safely absorbed by the injection,
however, it might leak to the screen that doesn't filter it.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.windows:
The API that controls the English state.
§7If disabled, IM_ENG_STATE command input mode will not work.
